briefTitle: A Study To Assess The Safety And Efficacy Of SU11248 In Patients With Gastrointestinal Stromal Tumor(GIST)
officialTitle: A Phase III, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Study Of SU011248 In The Treatment Of Patients With Imatinib Mesylate (Gleevec Tm, Glivec)-Resistant Or Intolerant Malignant Gastrointestinal Stromal Tumor
summary: A study to assess the safety and efficacy of SU11248 in patients with gastrointestinal stromal tumor (GIST) whose disease has failed imatinib therapy or who were intolerant to imatinib treatment.

primaryOutcome.measure: Time to Tumor Progression (TTP) as Assessed by Imaging Studies at End of Double-blind Treatment Phase
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Day 28 of each 6-week cycle : duration of double-blind treatment phase
